name: Tequila Limeade

ingredients.name: sprigs Cilantro leaves, plus a full sprig for garnish

preparation:
There’s little as refreshing during the summer swelter as a cool limeade. But when you add a bit of chile heat and tequila, well, that cooler gets a whole lot hotter.

For more great Mexican-inspired drinks—and tacos too!—head right this way.

Combine agave nectar, cilantro leaves and jalapeño slices in a shaking tin.

Muddle gently.

Add tequila, lime juice, and ice.

Shake and double strain into a collins or highball glass filled with ice.

Top with club soda.

Garnish with fresh sprig of cilantro.
